price: 18. Baanta fuxsinta ayró butta buttah anuk tamaaten. (woh Qhiyaamah ayró).
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
